description.en:
"You're sucking your son's friend's dick."

The divorced Mitsuru is drinking at home together with her son Youichi and his friend Kageyama-kun, when her son gets drunk and falls asleep. She's tipsy when Kageyama-kun begins to do lewd things with her right in front of her sleeping son!

Right there in front of Youichi is his mother — who he hasn't contacted after she got divorced — spontaneously putting in his friend's exposed dick into her mouth like it was the most natural thing to do, and gulps down his cum!

It doesn't stop there, as his friend penetrates her bareback doggy-style and begins thrusting fiercely! As a matter of course, it ends with him giving her pussy a creampie!

(Source: FANZA)

description.ja: 『息子の友達のち○ぽしゃぶってますよ 』 息子の友達・景山くんと家呑みしていると息子の陽一は酔っ払って寝てしまう。ほろ酔いの母と景山くんは寝ている息子の前でエッチなことを始めてしまう！！離婚後ご無沙汰だった母は目の前に突き出されたち○ぽを自然に口に咥えて白濁液を飲み込んでしまう！！それでも終わらずバックの体制で生挿入＆鬼ピストン！！当然膣内中出し！！
